description.full: A.R.E.S. Extinction Agenda EX, an action-packed side-scrolling game from Extend Studios, takes players on a thrilling sci-fi adventure!  Take control of combat specialist Ares, or the new playable character, Tarus, to battle deadly machines with a variety of powerful weapons and armor. Your goal: Save Minos Space Station’s survivors and uncover the nefarious Zytron’s extinction agenda!
